Earnest in SF is hiring an API Engineer

We're looking for an experienced API Engineer to help design and implement new services for our platform.

Some of the technologies we are prototyping with include: RabbitMQ, SQS/SNS, CoreOS (Docker, etcd, fleet, Kubernetes). Weâ€™re looking for folks with experience working with a similar architecture, or who desire technical challenges such as these.

Our Candidate: * You probably have 4 or more years of experience as a software engineer. We want experienced people here that can make competent architectural decisions without oversight. * You've worked on a diverse set of problems including architecting, building, shipping and maintaining high-quality software solutions. * You have experience building, shipping and maintaining APIs of reasonable complexity. * You have experience with relational databases such as PostgreSQL, Oracle or SQL Server. We use PostreSQL. * You have experience with Python/Django, Ruby/Rails or JavaScript/Restify

What we can offer you: * Competitive salary * Meaningful equity * Health benefits * Neighborhood housing stipend of $500 per month * Self-serve vacation policy * Ubiquity 401K plan to allow you to save for retirement

For more information go to: http://www.thesourcery.com/jobs/950
